name: Secret Societies
description: Secret Societies is an idle/incremental clicker game created by the New World Order. The player takes the role of an internet conspiracist who uses his ability to attract subscribers in order to take over the world. With 8 endings to work towards, the player can but is not limited to mind control, assassinating rivals, destroying humanity with a clone army and solving world hunger. As the player moves up in the world they must balance themselves between their online persona, cult leader charade and conglomerate business owner. With world control only a click away, which fate will you pursue?
